tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Great professor! Class was always interesting, but HARD. Required reading was often difficult as it was old and dry. Quizzes on the reading, sometimes weekly, 2 midterms, a group project and a final. Exams are difficult, must know EVERY PART of the theory she is asking about. She is sometimes too vague, ask for definition not example of the theory.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Fabian really wants everyone to pass and her class is fun to go to. Lots of notes, but come to class and pay attention and you\'ll pass. Reading quizzes usually once a week, not always. 2 Midterms, one multiple choice and then 3-5 essay questions. One big group project at the end of the quarter, but have a good team and it\'s easy.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: What a wonderful professor! She truly wants her student to succeed and actually learn something from her class. If you love essay questions exams, this is class to be in! (aced both midterms with flying colors). She has passion for what she talks about, her humor is actually funny, and she only hands out a few readings here and there. Nothing major

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
comments: She makes class very entertaining. I never get bored in her class. Very funny and sends off good energy. She loves teaching, and makes sure we understand her lectures. Just read whatever she assigns you because sometimes she assigns reading quizzes--you\'re allowed to use your book/notes tho. The midterms are difficult so make sure you study!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Fabian is a very straightforward, funny, sarcastic professor. Her teaching style is power points, with long blocks of info and charts at a time. She gives great help when you\'re confused. Very easy quizzes on the past readings so book is a must. Midtermsfinals are essay format so know the material very well so you can pour your soul into it.

stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ
comments: Okay professor, but do not expect to pass if you miss a couple of classes. I missed a bit of classes due to personal issues and ended up losing 15% of my grade. The fact that she did not accommodate or even slightly try to really bothered me. She basically said "there\'s nothing I can do" Lectures are long and must listen to pass. Exams are hard.

stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  HILARIOUS
comments: She is super straight forward and she doesn\'t have any trick questions on her tests. She makes sure that everyone is engaged and chooses volunteers at random so that you\'re always on your toes. Although it is a lot of work, she is one of the best professors and cares about your progress in the class and doesn\'t have long lectures. Just do your work

comments: She\'s really blunt, straight foward, etc. She is as legit as it gets education wise. University of Tokyo Todai, the most prestigious school of Japan and Stanford. Very interesting person, although she\'s not for everyone. I enjoyed the class a lot.

You have to be in class, because she gives a lot of notes!You have to pay attention and take notes to wtv is not on the board/slideshow since the test will be based on her definition,so take notes of her adlib.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: Very black and white class, either you read and know all the terms through her lectures and say exactly what she wants on the midterm and final and you pass, or not. You must regurgitate everything exactly back to her to pass. She\'ll also make you sing for 1 minute if you\'re late to class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: She is a pretty great professor. There are no hands on in class,just lecture for the entire time. Very clear lecture and very useful for the midterm. Beware her final!! She has said it is easier than her midterm, its not. If you show up, do the readings, and show interest, you will pass the class

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: I took Rika Fabian in my first quarter at De Anza and absolutely loved her class. She gives a quiz every class just to see if you did the reading. The readings are not hard but rather interesting and fun. Overall she is an amazing teacher who will make you fall in love with sociology. And I think that\'s the best thing a teacher can do.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: Fabian is a tough teacher. She expects A LOT from her students. She opens up the class by saying that you need to work hard or you WILL fail. I didn\'t find this comforting or very helpful. Why would you try to scare students from actually learning the content of the subject. Anyways, she is a stickler when it comes to everything. BEWARE.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: Not a lazy class. Usually assigned reading assignments with a Quiz the next class. You have to participate and know your stuff! You actually learn well in this class and she wants to push you to.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: She don\'t mess around. Very straight and to the point. Slight accent. Extremely good teacher. Uses text book, online articles, songs and other media to teach& relate to class. I learned more from her than ANY other SOC class ever. & i\'ve taken a few.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: This class is somewhat hard. A LOT of reading and quizzes (every other class). The teacher picks on you a lot. Doesn\'t give you homework but the class is very hard and overwhelming. Don\'t take it if you don\'t like to read.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: No, Ms. Fabian will not spoon-feed you; this does not mean she\'s a bad professor. She\'s very knowledgeable. If you\'re confused, see her during office hours- this is college. Fast-paced, provides fun examples that help things stick, always willing to talk 1-on-1. Incredible teacher. Not recommended for poor students.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Get ready to read (3)  Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: This teacher, Fabian, is all over the place and is one of the worst I\'ve ever had. The exams are timed, and it\'s not enough time at all and horrific in that they are mostly essay. I wish I had selected a different teacher.The questions were wordy had grammatical and spelling errors which was confusing, making hard to get a decent grade.
